ARABIC: خَلَقَ ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلْأَرْضَ بِٱلْحَقِّ تَعَٰلَىٰ عَمَّا يُشْرِكُونَ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: He created the heavens and the earth with truth. He is exalted above anything they associate with Him.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: He created the heavens and the earth with reason. Too glorious and high is He for what they associate with Him.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: He created the heavens and the earth with Truth. Exalted is He above whatever they associate with Allah in His Divinity.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: He has created the heavens and the earth for a genuine purpose. He is too Exalted to be considered equal to anything else.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: He created the heavens and the earth with the truth; Supreme is He above their ascribing of partners (to Him).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: He has created the heavens and the earth with truth. High is He, Exalted above all that they associate as partners with Him.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: He created the heavens and the earth with the truth, highly exalted be He above what they associate (with Him).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: He created the heavens and the earth in truth; high be He exalted above that they associate With Him!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: He hath created the heavens and the earth with truth. High be He Exalted above all that they associate (with Him).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: He created the heavens and the earth for a true purpose. He is exalted above anything they associate with Him.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: He hath created the heavens and the earth with a purpose. Exalted is He above that which they associate.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: He created the heavens and the earth with consummate wisdom. He is above having any partners that they ascribe [to Him].
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: He has created the heavens and the earth for just ends: Far is He above having the partners they ascribe to Him!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: He has created the heavens and the earth with truth. High be He Exalted above all they associate as partners with Him.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: He created the heavens and the earth with truth. Exalted is He above what they associate (with Him)!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: He created the heavens and the earth with justice. He is exalted above the associations they attribute.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: He created the heavens and earth in truth. High is He above what they associate with Him.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [16:3] He created the heavens and the earth with the Truth, that is, with the purpose of [manifesting] truth. Exalted be He above what they associate, with Him in the way of idols.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (He hath created the heavens and the earth with truth) for the Truth; it is also said that this means: for evanescence and extinction. (High be He exalted) He exonerates Himself (above all that they associate (with Him)) of idols.
